description: A mountain region where the disaster caused perpetual winter. Emphasizes temperature survival, construct combat, and ancient mysteries.
theme: endurance, ancient secrets, warmth as precious resource

frozen_pass.name: Frozen Pass
frozen_pass.description: Entry point through the mountains. Biting cold, but survivable.

temple_sanctum.name: Temple Sanctum
temple_sanctum.description: Ancient temple guarded by Stone Golems. Cold but sheltered.

ice_caves.name: Ice Caves
ice_caves.description: Natural cave system with treacherous footing. Freezing temperature.

hot_springs_refuge.name: Hot Springs Refuge
hot_springs_refuge.description: Volcanic activity creates a warm zone. Natural healing area.

hot_springs.effect: Bathing restores health (5 per turn), cures hypothermia

frozen_observatory.name: Frozen Observatory
frozen_observatory.description: High peak with clear view. Extreme cold - limited time without protection.

ancient_telescope.when_repaired: Reveals distant locations, shows current state of regions, provides hints about optimal exploration order

traits: wind trying to tear you away

stone_golem_1.name: Stone Guardian
stone_golem_1.description: A massive humanoid of carved stone, runes glowing along its limbs.

transitions.hostile->passive: Control crystal repaired OR password spoken OR correct offering

combat_notes.tactics: Use stone pillars for cover (80% damage reduction), hit-and-run

password.effect: Golems hesitate but still require confirmation

ritual_offering.effect: Golems recognize ancient protocol, become passive

stone_golem_2.name: Stone Guardian
stone_golem_2.description: A massive humanoid of carved stone, identical to its partner.
stone_golem_2.notes: Shares state with golem_1 - if one is deactivated, both are

steam_salamander_1.name: Steam Salamander
steam_salamander_1.description: A lizard-like creature wreathed in steam. It regards you with glowing eyes.

transitions.neutral->friendly: Offered fire-aspected item (torch, fire crystal, etc.)

companion_benefits: Warmth aura: cold immunity when nearby
companion_restrictions: Uncomfortable in normal temperature (will wait at region borders)

cold_weather_gear.name: cold weather gear
cold_weather_gear.description: Heavy furs and insulated clothing left by previous travelers.
cold_weather_gear.effect: Halves hypothermia accumulation in cold areas

preserved_supplies.name: preserved supplies
preserved_supplies.description: Frozen food and useful materials, still usable.

partial_map.name: partial map
partial_map.description: A torn map showing parts of the Frozen Reaches.
partial_map.reveals: Temple location, hot springs location, warning about observatory cold

ice_crystals.name: ice crystals
ice_crystals.description: Beautiful crystals that never melt, infused with cold magic.

frost_lily.name: frost lily
frost_lily.description: A delicate white flower that thrives in extreme cold.
frost_lily.use: Trade item for Bee Queen in Beast Wilds

ice_shard.name: ice shard
ice_shard.description: A fragment of magical ice that pulses with cold energy.
ice_shard.use: Required for waystone repair in Nexus

crystal_lens.name: crystal lens
crystal_lens.description: A precisely ground lens, frozen into an ice wall.
crystal_lens.location: Hidden in ice caves, requires careful extraction

mounting_bracket.name: mounting bracket
mounting_bracket.description: A metal bracket inscribed with alignment runes.

cold_resistance_cloak.name: cold resistance cloak
cold_resistance_cloak.description: A cloak woven with protective enchantments against cold.
cold_resistance_cloak.effect: Immunity to cold damage in cold areas, reduced damage in freezing areas

lore_tablets.name: lore tablets
lore_tablets.description: Stone tablets covered in ancient writing.
lore_tablets.content: History of the Meridian, the disaster, temple purpose, complete password

control_crystal.name: control crystal
control_crystal.description: A crystal that resonates with the golems' enchantments.
control_crystal.location: Ice Caves (frozen in wall, requires extraction)

temperature_zones.extreme_cold: +20 hypothermia per turn, requires full protection

thin_ice.detection: Careful examination or tracking skill reveals
thin_ice.breaking: Fall through, drowning rules apply + cold damage
thin_ice.crossing_safely: Test ice first, or go around

slippery_surfaces.effect: Chance of falling in combat, movement uncertain

to_nexus.notes: Cold does not penetrate Nexus. Salamanders comfortable there.

cross_region_items.frost_lily: To Beast Wilds for bee queen trade
cross_region_items.ice_crystals: To Fungal Depths as Myconid payment
cross_region_items.control_crystal: From Ice Caves, used in Temple Sanctum
cross_region_items.cleaning_supplies: From Nexus, needed for telescope repair

cold_spread.if_unresolved: Cold gradually spreads to other regions
cold_spread.effects_of_spread: Some outdoor areas in other regions become cold zones

salamander_alliance.companion: One salamander can follow as companion in Nexus

temple_completion.fast_travel: Unlocks fast travel to Frozen Reaches from waystone (when repaired)

narrative_role.core_tension: Hostile environment that requires preparation and patience
narrative_role.contrast_with_other_regions: Unlike Beast Wilds (social) or Sunken District (time pressure), this is about methodical exploration

multiple_approaches.temple_golems: Combat (very hard), password (research), control crystal (exploration), offering (items)

player_choices_matter: Fighting golems vs deactivating them affects available loot
Befriending salamanders provides long-term cold immunity
Repairing telescope provides information advantage for rest of game

commitment_system.description: Fewer direct NPC commitments in this region - primarily environmental challenges. Salamanders are the main social element.

salamander_commitment.note: Salamanders are elemental - not affected by hope, but appreciate the intent
salamander_commitment.fulfillment_bonus: +2 gratitude. All salamanders become friendly simultaneously.

withdrawal_response.dialog: The salamander tilts its head, flame flickering in its eyes. It makes a gesture toward the Hot Springs - showing where it will wait. No judgment, only patient warmth.

abandonment_effects.note: Salamanders don't die from lack of player help - they're fine without you
abandonment_effects.effect: No penalty. Salamanders simply remain neutral. No spread effects.
abandonment_effects.echo_reaction: None - The Echo doesn't comment on failed elemental befriending

cross_region_commitment.note: The Frozen Reaches is often a SOURCE of commitments made elsewhere
examples: Myconids ask for ice crystals - player commits, must return to Frozen Reaches
Observatory reveals dying NPC elsewhere - creates urgency to help them
cross_region_commitment.design_principle: This region tests whether player keeps promises made in OTHER regions

open_questions.question: How hard should extracting the crystal lens be?
open_questions.proposed: Requires: (1) Find it (hidden in ice wall, exploration or hints), (2) Extract it (fire source to melt ice carefully, OR chip away with tool). Breaking it destroys it.

open_questions.question: Can player enter observatory without cold protection?
open_questions.proposed: Yes, but 5 turn limit before severe hypothermia. Creates tension - explore quickly or prepare properly.

open_questions.question: What does the observatory reveal when repaired?
open_questions.proposed: Shows: (1) Spore Mother's health (is she dying?), (2) Survivor camp morale, (3) Whether NPCs in other regions are still alive, (4) Hidden paths not otherwise findable.
